title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6173.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part shall govern the funding of provider agencies to offer livery
vehicle safety training programs to eligible drivers. (b) Funds available for disbursement pursuant
to this Part shall include those funds appropriated by the State Legislature
and funds received by the State from any public or private agency or person, including the Federal government, for purposes of the Livery Vehicle Safety

Training Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6173.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
